ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: Sta. CANCAP 2.164 Canary Islands, S of Hierro, off Punta de la Restinga, 27°21'N 18°01'W. Depth 0-2000 m (bottom at 2700 m), 21.14-00.45 hrs. Ring-trawl. 10.ix.1977.
